alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Linch, or 22 miles southeast of Kaycee, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Linch around 330 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 230 and 233. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
